headline: Omuwanika Waggwa Nsibirwa ayanjudde alipoota ku nsimbi ezava mu Luwalo eziwera akawumbi kalamba
text: Minisita w’ebyenfuna era Omuwanika w’ eggwanika lya Buganda, Owek. Robert Waggwa Nsibirwa ategeezezza nti abantu ba Buganda bongedde okujjumbira enteekateeka z’okulaakulanya Obuganda nga bawaayo ensimbi mu nteekateeka y’Oluwalo okusobola okuwagira enteekateeka za Beene. Alipoota omuwanika agiweeredde mu Bulange e Mmengo ku Lwokubiri mu lukung’aana lwa bannamawulire olwetabiddwamu ne minisita omubeezi owa gavumenti ez’ ebitundu Joseph Kawuki. Owek. Waggwa Nsibirwa ategeezezza nti mu luwalo lw’omwaka 2022 basobola okukungaanya ensimbi eziwera akawumbi kamu n’emitwalo 90 wansi w’enteekateeka y’ Oluwalo lwaffe nga zino zakungaanyizibwa nezisengekebwa okusinziira ku masaza n’eggombolola eziri mu Buganda n’ebweru waayo. Okusinziira ku Owek. Waggwa Nsibirwa ensimbi zino zisaasanyiziddwa ku bintu ebyenjawulo mu bwakabaka era Katikkiro Mayiga bweyali aggalawo Oluwalo lw’ omwaka 2022 yalagira eggwanika okufulumya ensaasaanya y’ensimbi zino okusobola okunyweza ennyingo y’ obwerufu. Omuwanika agamba nti ensimbi zino zizze zirinnya mu myaka ag’enjawulo nga mu 2017 bakung’aanya obukadde 202, mu 2018 nebafuna obukade 414, 2019 obukadde 515, 2020 obukadde 352,2021 obukadde 654ne 2022 akawumbi kalamba n’emitwalo 90.  Owek. Nsibirwa annyonnyodde nti Obukadde 60 bwawagira okulwanyisa mukenenya mu bwakabaka, ate obukadde 100 nebusibwa ku mulimu gw’ okuzzaawo Muzibwazaalampanga. Ekitongole kya Beene ekya Kabaka Education Fund bakiteekamu obukadde 76 ate Emmwaanyi Terimba nebagiwa obukadde 283 n’emitwalo 72. Ono agasseeko nti omulimu gw’okuwa abantu amazzi amayonjo nga bayita mukusima enzizi baziteekako obukadde 39 nga zino zaava mu ssaza lya Rocky Mountains mu Amerika. Minisita Nsibirwa agamba nti emirimu gy’ Embuga bagiteekako obukadde 71 nemitwalo 41 mu 7000m so nga okusembeza abagenyi ba Nnyinimu mu Bulange kwatwala obukadde 210 n’emitwalo 56. Ensimbi obukadde 93 n’emitwalo 45 mu lukumi zazzibwaayo ku Ggombolola ate amasaza ga Beene omuli Ankole, Mbale, Busia Malaba Tororo ne Busoga gaweebwa obukadde 13 emitwalo 57 mu lukumi.. Owek. Waggwa agamba nti waliwo obubonero bungi obulaga nti abantu ba beene bongedde okusiima enteekateeka eno mu bikolwa kubanga ebisinga bibaganyula buteerevu nga mu nkola eno Obwakabaka bwakasima enzizi 671. Ye Minisita omubeezi owa Gavumenti ez’ ebitundu, Owek. Joseph Kawuki ategezezza nti oluwalo luyambye okuzimba obukulembeze n’okukola ennyo mu bantu ba Kabaka kubanga ku mitendera gyonna abantu balwetabamu butereevu.

headline: KCCA egenda kubonereza bannyini bizimbe abakkirizza abatembeeyi ku mbalaza zabwe
text: Ekitongole kya Kampala Capital City Authority (KCCA)kifulumizza ebiragiro ebikulu musanvu eri bannanyini bizimbe mu Kampala omuli okubisiiga, okubigobako abatembeeyi abakolera ku bbalaza zaabyo. Okusobola okulaba nti bino bituukirira, waliwo engassi eziteekeddwawo omuli n’okuggala ebizimbe bino singa binaasangibwa nga bigaanye okugondera ensonga zino. Ebiragiro bino bifulumiziddwa omubaka wa Pulezidenti mu Kampala, Hudu Hussein leero ku Lwokubiri ku Media Centre mu Kampala. Okusinziira ku Hudu, bino byonna bigendereddwamu okukyusa endabika y’ekibuga Kampala kituukane ku mutindo gw’ebibuga ebirala mu nsi yonna nga Dubai. Mu biragiro bino, Amaduuka, Akeedi, bannyini bizimbe n’abavunaanyizibwa ku bizimbe awamu ne bannyini ttaka balina obuvunaanyizibwa okugoba abatembeeyi ababikolerako nga bakolagana ne poliisi awamu ne KCCA. Hussein agasseeko nti batandise dda okukola ku ky’okuggya abaana abasabiriza ku nguudo era bali mu nteeseganya ku kye balina okukolera ababuulira enjiri ku nguudo kuba abasinga abantu bazze babeemulugunyaako enfunda eziwera. Mu birala, KCCA eyagala bannyini bizimbe bayambeko okugoba enzikiza ku bizimbe n’enguudo za Kampala nga bateeka amataala ne kkamera z’ekika kya CCTV ku bizimbe byabwe okusobola okunyweza eby’okwerinda. Hudu agamba nti amataala bano balina okugateeko nga akabonero ak’okuddiza eri ekibuga ku nsimbi obuwanana ze bayoola okuva mu bapangisa ebizimbe bino era n’alabula ne bannyini bizimbe abatafaayo kubiddaabiriza. Ono alaze ebimu ku bizimbe ebiri mu mbeera embi nga ku bino kuliko; Cham Towers, MTN Towers ne NSSF Towers by’agamba nti byetaagako langi empya bituukane n’omutindo. Mu ngeri yeemu ebizimbe byonna birina okuteekebwako amannya ne nnamba mu bwangu ddala. Ku nsonga ya Boodabooda, Hudu annyonnyodde nti bali mu kwebuuza okulaba engeri gye basobola okubawa obukooti obuliko ennamba z’ekika kya QR era bawandiisibwe okusinziira ku ssiteegi zaabwe era bano bakutendekebwa era abo bokka abanaatuukiriza ebisaanyizo be bagenda okukkiriza okukolera mu Kampala. KCCA yaakwongera okusimba omuddo n’emiti mu kibuga wakati mu nteekateeka y’okulabang’ekibuga kyongera okufaanana obulungi.

headline: Ab’e Bukomansimbi balabuddwa ku ssente z’emyoga, tujja kubasiba
text: Bukomansimbi – Buddu Abantu ba Kabaka abawangaalira mu disitulikiti y’e Bukomansimbi balabuddwa ku nsimbi z’emyoga singa banaazikozesa obubi nti abamu baakufundikira nga bali mu makomera kuba ensimbi zino si zaakulya wabula okwekulaakulanya. Okulabula kuno kukoleddwa akulira ekitongole  kya Micro-Finance Support Centre mu bbendobendo ly’e Masaka,  Katobe Wilfreds,  bw’abadde abangula abatuuze ba Bukomansimbi North ne South ku nteekateeka eno ku kitebe kya disitulikiti. Katobe agambye nti waliwo abantu abategese SACCO ez’ebicupuli basobole okuganyulwa mu nsimbi zino naye balina okukimanya nti babeetegekedde. Enteekateeka eno mu kitundu kya Bukomansimbi North ne South ezingiramu SACCO 36 era nga bano babanguddwa ku nkozesa y’ensimbi zino era ne baweebwa amabaluwa. Bano oluvannyuma lw’okutendekebwa bati balinze kuganyulwa mu nsimbi ezisoba mu kawumbi akalamba  (1.12billon) ezaatuuse edda ku akawunta zaabwe basobole okwekulaakulanya. Ye omukwanaganya w’enteekateeka y’emyoga mu mu bitundu by’e Masaka, Gonzaga Muteesaasira,  yeebazizza Pulezidenti Museveni olw’enteekateeka eno  ng’agamba nti abantu bangi basula ng’emitima gibeewanise (ku bunkenke)  nga Bbanka n’abawola embaata babatwalako ebintu byabwe,  naye kati omuntu wa wansi ajja kusobola okweggya mu bwavu. Mu ngeri y’emu omubaka wa Pulezidenti e Bukomansimbi, Teopisita Lule Ssenkungu,  ategeezezza nti bakoze okunoonyereza era ne bazuula nti  SACCO eziweereddwa amabaluwa z’entuufu n’asaba abantu okwebuuza  ku bantu ababasingako, okwewala  okukola ensobi. Bo abantu ab’enjawulo  ababanguddwa basiimye gavumenti ku nteekateeka eno ne basuubiza okugikozesa obulungi.

headline: Olukiiko lwa Buganda luyisizza ebiteeso 6 –  lwagala endagaano y’EmmwAanyi eya kampuni ya Vinci esazibwemu
text: Olukiiko lwa Buganda luyisizza ebiteeso mukaaga mu lutuula olw’okusatu olw’omwaka ogwa 29,nerusemba endagaano yeyakolebwa wakati wa gavumenti ne kampuni ya Vinci Coffee Co. Ltd esazibwemu mu bwangu. Mu lukiiko luno olubadde lukubirizibwa Sipiika Patrick Luwaga Mugumbule luyisizza ebiteeso lweyamidde ku ndagaano eno abakiise nebakuba ebituli ku Musigansimbi ono eyaleeteddwa okulaakulanya emmwanyi kyokka nga talina ssente, nebalabula gavumenti ku ndagaano ekika kino. Abakiise bakkaanyiza awatali kwekutulamu endagaano eno esazibwemu kuba terina kalungi kegenda kuleeta eri abalimi b’emmwaanyi mu Uganda ne Buganda. Olukiiko lusembye Katikkiro okulondoola ensonga y’okuteekawo ttabamiruka w’abalimi b’emmwanyi bonna mu Uganda,n’ekigendererwa eky’okutema empenda ez’okuyamba bannayuganda okusigala mu bulimi n’obusuubuzi bw’emmwaanyi. Mu ngeri yeemu Olukiiko luvumiridde abantu abatulugunya abavubi, abalunnyanja, nabalunzi b’ebyenyanja n’ekigendererwa ky’okwagala okubagoba mu nnyanja n’okubagoba mu mulimu gw’okulunda ebyenyanja nelusaba kino kibeereko ekkomo. Olukiiko lusembye Obwakabaka okuteekawo enkola enayamba okulambika abantu ku nsonga y’ennyimbe mu Buganda awamu n’okubabangula ku by’obusika, n’ebiteeso ebirala okusobola okutaasa obuwangwa n’ennono za Buganda. Olukiiko lusembye nti mu ngeri eyenjawulo luseewo amaanyi mu kugunjula n’okutendeka omwana ow’obulenzi mu Buganda.

headline: Omugagga Abid Alam asindikiddwa mu kkomera e Kitalya
text: Abid Alam mu galubindi [ekifananyi kya Nilepost]  Omugagga Abid Alam ekawungeezi kaleero asindikiddwa mu kkomera e Kitalya okutuuka nga May 8 lwanadda mu kkooti okwewozaako. Ono  eyakwatibwa sabbiiti ewedde akakiiko akakola kukulwanyisa enguzi mu  maka g’obwapulezidenti nga kakulirwa munnamagye, Col. Edith Nakalema. Alam n’abasirikale ba poliisi bana eb’ekitundu ky’e Wamala bavunaanibwa okutulugunya abatuuze be Kassanda ng’abaagala babagobe kuttaka lyabwe. Abasirikale kuliko  akulira okunonyereza ku buzzi bw’emisango mu kitundu ky’e Wamala, Wilbert Osin Wanyama,akulira poliisi y’e Kassanda  Daniel Owellano, wamu n’akulira okunonyereza mu kitundu ky’ekimu   Peter Beitera ssako n’akulira okunonyereza ku poliisi y’e Kassanda  Sgt. Azale.  Kigambibwa bano bayambako Alam okumuwa fayiro ekwata kuttaka erikayanirwa e Kassanda kweyasinziira n’agoba abatuuze ku ttaka wamu n’okubatulugunya. Abataano bano bonna beeganye emisango gino.

headline: Katikkiro Mayiga atongozza eng’oma Ggwangamujje okulwanyisa COVID-19
text: Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayigaatongozzaeng’oma Ggwangamujje egenda okukubwa Abaami ba Kabakamu nteekateeka y’okukunga abantu ba Beene wonna mu Buganda okusitukiramu balwanyise ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona era n’asaba Abaami okukulemberamu olutalo luno. Enteekateeka eno ebadde mu Bulange- Mmengo ku Lwokusatu era Mukuumaddamula asinzidde wano n’asaba abantu okumanya akabi akali mu bulwadde buno obwa Lumiimamawuggwe. “Kambabuulire empologoma eyatulumba ye Lumiimamawuggwe, etusensera, etulya tetulaba era tetutegedde kuba ffenna abali wano tusobola okuba nga tulina obulwadde nga tetumanyi, ayinza okuba mu ngalo, leka kwekwata mu nnyindo, mu maaso, mu mimwa. Akabi kajja tulina okutegeeza ensi nti empologoma ezze naye bwe weerwanako ogiwona naye bwe weekwata ku maaso ekulya.” Kamalabyonna Mayiga agamba nti mu buli mbeera, eggwanga lirina okusoosowaza ebyobulamu era n’asaba Abaami ba Kabaka okukulemberamu olutalo ku Lumiimamawuggwe nga Beene bwe yalagira. Okusinziira ku Katikkiro Mayiga, ekisinga okutta bantu mu bulwadde buno kwe kuba nti obulwadde buno bwetooloddwa obutamanya era abantu n’ebintu ebyandibayambye babyesammula nga balowooza nti birimu akabi. Mayiga asiimye aba Dreamline Products olw’obuyiiya mu kusaasaanya amawulire agakwata ku Sennyiga Corona kuba okuva edda obuyiiya bw’eng’oma omwali Saagalaagalamidde, Ggwangamujje n’endala, zaayambanga nnyo okutumbula embeera z’abantu n’okubakuuma. “Mu Mirembe egyayita abalya ensi baali abo abalina ffeeza ne zzaabu, ekiseera ne kijja ng’abalina amatwale nga Bungereza. Ekiseera ne kituuka nga abalina amafuta be baliwo naye batugamba nti, oyo agenda okulya ensi mu biseera eby’omu maaso y’oyo ategedde ebyempuliziganya era atambula n’okumanya.” Owek. Mayiga bw’alambuludde. Mu ngeri yeemu ku mukolo guno, Obwakabaka buyingidde mu ndagaano n’aba Dreamline Products nga ku lwa Buganda, Owek.Hajji Amisi Kakomo y’ataddeko omukono ate Kenneth Mulondo n’assaako ku lwa Dreamline Products. Minisita omubeeziow’ebyamawulire ne tekinologiya mu gavumenti eyaawakati,Owek.Joyce Nabbosa Ssebuggwawo asinzidde wano n’asaba abasomesa beegemese kisobozese okwanguyizagavumenti okukola enteekateeka z’okuggulawo amasomeroera n’asaba abantu okwekuuma ekirwadde kino. Omukungu wa Dreamline Products,Mw. Kenneth Mulondoategeezezza nti basinzidde ku bukulu bw’eng’oma ne bakkiriza nti esobola okukunga abantu okusobola okulwanyisa Ssenyiga Corona. Mu nteekateeka eno, eng’oma eno yaakukubibwa okukubiriza abantu okukola, okuteeka mu nkola ebiragiro by’abasawo ku kulwanyisa Ssenyiga coronanga mu binokuliko; okunaaba mu ngalo, okwambala obukookolo, okwewa amabanga n’ebirala.

headline: Bannayuganda basabiddwa okwetangira endwadde
text: Bannayuganda basabiddwa okufaayo okwetangira endwadde ezitali zimu bweba baagala okulaakulana n’okukyuusa embeera yabwe olwo Buganda edde ku ntikko. Okusaba kuno kukoleddwa Omulangira Felix Muteesa bw’abadde atikkula Amakula okuva mu bannassingo mu lubiri e Mmengo ku Lwokubiri. Bano Muteesa abasabye okwewala endwadde zinamutta basobole okubeera abalamu kuba abantu abalamu bokka be basobola okulaakulanya ensi Buganda. Omulangira era abakubiriza okuba abakozi nga lwebagya okusoboola okutuukiriza ebiruubirirwa byabwe . Katikkiro w’Ebyalo bya Kabaka Omuk.Moses Luutu asabye abazadde okwongera okugumiza obuvunqnnyizibwa bwabwe eri abaana okuteekateeka eggwanga eryenkya erituukiridde. Ye Omwami wa Kabaka amulamulirako eggombolola ya mumyuka Busimbi David Ssendikadiwa agamba nti basoomozebwa enjala kyokka nakakasa nti olw’obukulembeze obulungi ebisoomozo bagezezaako okubirinya ku nfeete. Mukwenda eyawummula era omukiise wa Ssingo mu lukiiko lwa Buganda owek. Stanley Kijjambu yeebaziza banassingo olw’okufaayo okutuukiriza ennono yabwe nga lino ryerimu ku makubo ag’okuzza Buganda ku ntikko Amakula gano gavudde mu ggombolola ya Mumyuka Busimbi okuva mu ssaza lye Ssingo.

headline: Bannabuddu beefumiitirizza ku Mukenenya
text: Bya Muwuluzi Yusuf  Abantu ba Ssaabasajja Kabaka mu ssaza ly’e Buddu basisinkanye okwefumiitiriza ku ngeri ekirwadde kya Mukenenya gye kikosezzaamu abantu naddala abaliko obulemu. Ppookino n’abamu ku baliko obulemu Bino byabaddewo eggulo ku lunaku lw’ensi yonna olw’ekirwadde kino era ng’ensisinkano eno yabaddemu ab’ekitongole kya MADIPHA ekiyambako abaliko obulemu naye nga mu kiseera kye kimu bawangaala n’ekirwadde kino n’okulaba bwe basobola okubulwanyisa. Ku mukolo ogwabadde ku ssaza nga gwabaddemu ebikonge by’Obwakabaka, abakulembeze mu Masaka, bannaddiini n’abakulembeze babaliko obulemu mu kitundu kino. Mu bubaka bwe obwamusomeddwa Ppookino Jude Muleke, Minisita wa gavumenti z’ebitundu mu Buganda, Owek.Joseph Kawuki yategeezezza nti abantu amaanyi babadde bagamalidde ku Ssennyiga Corona ne beerabira Mukenenya. Minisita yagasseeko nti Obwakabaka busaale nnyo mu kulwanyisa obulwadde bwa Ssiriimu era n’akubiriza abantu okwekuuma. “Tusaana tutaase abaliko obulemu obutasaabaana kawuka ka Mukenenya.” Bw’atyo Owek. Kawuuki bwe yayongeddeko era ne yeebaza essaza Buddu n’ekitongole kya MADIPHA. Ye Ppookino mu bubaka bwe yavumiridde nnyo ebikolwa eby’ekko ebyetobese mu kalulu kano naddala ebyo ebikolebwa abakuumaddembe. Wabula ono yasabye abavubuka okwewala ebikolwa eby’effujjo olwo lwe banaateekebwamu obwesige. Ssenkulu w’ekibiina kya MADIPHA, Musisi Richard, yannyonnyodde nti ng’abaliko obulemu basanga okusoomoozebwa okuwangaala n’ekirwadde kino. Rev. Fr. Aloysius Kalwowa nga ye yakiikiridde omusumba w’ssaza ly’e Masaka, Bishop Serverus Jjumba, ku lwa bannaddiini yasabye wabeewo okunoonyereza ku bintu ebiremesa abantu okuvaayo okwatula mu lwatu nti balina Siriimu nga n’abamu eddagala balimirira mu nkukutu. Oluvannyuma woofiisi ya Ppookino yawaddeyo ebimu ku bikozesebwa abantu abaliko obulemu.

headline: Abasawo b’e Mulago bayambako okubbayo abalwadde – Minisitule y’ebyobulamu
text: Kampala Abamu ku basawo b’eddwaliro ekkulu e Mulago basongeddwamu okubeera emabega w’omuzze gw’okubba abalwadde mu ddwaliro lino nebabatwala mu malwaliro g’obwannanyini. Kino kibotoddwa akulira eddwaliro lino  Dr Baterena Byarugaba  eggulo ku Lwokuna bweyabadde n’abakungu ba Minisitule y’ebyobulamu nga boogerako eri bannamawulire. Dr. Baterena agamba nti byebakazuulawo biraga nti waliwo bakayungirizi abalinda abalwadde mu bifo awasimba emmotoka  ku ddwaliro lino wamu n’abasawo ababuzaabuza abalwadde nebabatwala mu malwaliro agaliraanye Mulago. Ono yalaajanidde abakulu mu Minisitule okubaako kyebakolawo kuba omuzze guno gutadde obulamu bwa bannayuganda mu matigga. Dr. Baterena yawadde eky’okulabirako ky’omwana eyagyibwa e Mulago natwalibwa mu ddwaliro ly’obwannanyini kyokka nalongoosebwa bub inga kati ensonga ziri mu kkooti ekitatanye ekifananyi ky’eddwaliro lino. Bino webijidde nga Minisita omubeezi ow’ebyobulamu Robinah Nabbanja yatandikawo okulambula eddwaliro lino buli Lwakuna okusobola okutereeza emirimu wamu n’okutumbula obuweereza nga alwanyisa obulyi bw’enguzi. Kinajjukirwa nti mu mwaka 2019, Pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta Museveni yalagira amalwaliro agatunda eddwaliro naddala mu ddwaliro lino okuggalawo nga agamba nti bano bali bawandikira abalwadde eddagala eriri mu malwaliro gaabwe olwo nebabasindikayo okuligula.

headline: Katikkiro Akuutidde Bannayuganda Obutassa Mukono Kukulwanyisa Kirwadde Kya Coronavirus
text: Katikkiro wa Buganda Charles Peter Mayiga asabye abantu ba Uganda obutasuula nnanga mu kulwanyisa ekirwadde kya coronavirus. Bwabadde ayogerako eri eggwanga mu maka g’obwakatikkiro, mu Butikkiro e Mmengo, Mayiga agambye nti abantu bangi kati beerabidde nti tebalina kukwata bantu mungalo, obuteekwata mu nnyindo, akamwa n’amaaso, okwambala obukookolo wamu n’okussa mu nkola enkola ya tonsemberera. Oweek. Mayiga ategeezezza nti ssenyiga kolona tannafuna ddagala. “Ng’ojjeeko ennambika etuweebwa ab’ebyobulamu tulina okusigala nga tutambulira ku nnambika etuweebwa gavumenti; tulina okubitambulirako; era ekimu ku bbyo kwekusigala ewaka eri abo abatalina nnyo nsonga ebajjayo. Abaana mubakuumire awaka ate abazadde mufube okulaba nga beewala emize,” Mayiga bwagambye. Asabye abaana okufuba okusomera awaka era n’abazadde okufuba okulaba ng’abaana bagoberera byebalaba ku terefaayina. Mu birala, Mayiga asabye abantu okukomya okukungaana ku mikolo egy’enjawulo kubanga gyebakoma okukungaana abangi, gyebakomya okutambuza akawuka kolona. “Ensi tejja kusaanawo nga tokoze mukolo naye bwekiba kyakufa nakuwona, mu kikole nga mu kungaana batono. Ebiragiro bino byonna bikaluubiriza naye bitaasa bulamu bwaffe kubanga kyekyokulwanyisa kyokka kyetulinawo,” Mayiga bwagambye. Agasseeko nti Pulezidenti Museveni bweyatoowolokosa ku mateeka g’omuggalo abantu abamu baalowooza kolona aweddeyo. “Twagala abantu bakole basobole okweyimirizaawo, balabirire abantu baabwe, bakulaakulane badde ku ntikko, twagala Buganda ngeri ku ntikko mu byenfuna ne mu mbeera z’abantu naye twagala abantu basooke bataase obulamu,” Mayiga bwagambye. Woosomera bino ng’omuwendo gw’abantu abaakazuulwamu kolona guweze 724 mu Uganda.

headline: Mulonde abalina emiramwa egitugasa nga Buganda – Owek. Mayiga
text: Bulange- Mmengo Kamalabyonna wa Buganda, Charles Peter Mayiga, asabye abalonzi okulonda abakulembeze abafaayo ku byenfuna, eddembe ly’obuntu wamu n’Obulamu bw’abantu be bakulembera mu kalulu kano aka 2021. Owek. Mayiga nga akwasa Ssentebe wa Masaka, Jude Mbabali omujoozi gweyaguze Okwogera bino Kamalabyonna abadde atikkula Oluwalo olw’obukadde obusobye mu 40 okuva mu Busiro wamu ne bannabyabufuzi abakyadde embuga olunaku lwaleero ku Lwokubiri mu bimuli bya Bulange. Mu Luwalo lwaleero, eggombolola ya Nsangi y’enywedde akendo n’eddirirwa ab’e Kikandwa. “Mulonde abantu abo abalina emiramwa egitugasa nga Buganda, mulonde abo abalina emiramwa egikomyawo ekitiibwa kya Uganda okuyitibwa ekkula lya Africa.” Katikkiro Mayiga bw’agambye. Ow’eggombola nga afuna ekiwandiiko okuva ewa Katikkiro Mayiga Katikkiro Mayiga annyonnyodde nti Buganda erina omugabo munene mu Uganda era n’alabula abakola obuzannyo ku masaza agali mu Buganda nga baagala okugawula nti, tebajja kubakkiriza. Ono agambye nti kasita omuntu assa ekitiibwa mu nnono ya Buganda tebabeera na nsonga lwaki tebatambula naye. Owek. Mayiga ategeezezza nti kikyamu okulowooza nti ebyobufuzi kazannyo kuba tebisobola kubeera kazannyo ne bizza Buganda ku ntikko wadde okukuza Uganda, kubanga kino kirina kuva mu bukulembeze. Asabye abantu okwerinda ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona kuba gyekiri era baleme kubuzaabuzibwa byabufuzi, wabula n’avumirira ekya gavumenti okutta abantu ng’erwanyisa Ssennyiga Corona. Kamalabyonna Charles Peter Mayiga ategeezezza nti enkola y’Oluwalo eyamba okutaba Oluganda kubanga Buganda erimu amawanga mangi era n’ebiti by’abantu bingi era ng’okuva edda Buganda erimu ebintu ebirimu ebibaawula. Minisita wa gavumenti ez’ebitundu era Ssaabawolereza w’Obwakabaka, Christopher Bwanika, ategeezezza nti Oluwalo nkola ya nnono era ne yeebaza abaluleese. Ono era y’ayanjudde omugenyi wa Katikkiro ow’enjawulo, Omulangira Namuyonjo okuva e Bugerere ng’ono yazze ne ttiimu gy’akola nayo era nga bano baguze emijoozi okusobola okwetaba mu nteekateeka y’emisinde gya Kabaka. Ssebwana Kiberu Charles Kisiriiza, asiimye obuwulize bw’abaami b’amasaza n’amagombolola. Ono era yeebazizza bannabyabufuzi abakiise embuga olw’okukkiriza okukyala embuga. Omubaka Medard Ssegona ategeezezza nti ekyabatwala mu Palamenti kwe kukendeeza ku bifunfugu ebikasukirwa Ssaabasajja Kabaka n’Obuganda, okulaba nti babikwata. Ono asabye Mukuumaddamula abagambire ku balina emmundu bakomye okutugumbula abantu kubanga kiyitiridde. Mmeeya wa ttawuni y’e Nsangi, Hajji Abdul Kiyimba, asiimye Katikkiro Mayiga olw’okukolerera Obuganda era n’amusaba amuwaddeko eddusu asobole okuwangula akalulu. Abalala abeetabye ku mukolo guno kubaddeko Minisita w’ebyettaka era ng’omugenyi ow’enjawulo abadde Omulangira Namuyonjo aguze emijoozi okwenyigira mu nteekateeka y’emisinde gy’Amazaalibwa.

headline: Kkooti egobye ogwa People Power obutabeera mpandiise
text: Kampala Kkooti etaputa Ssemateeka mu Kampala egobye omusango ogwali guwakanya ekisinde kya People Power ekikulirwa Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu aka Bobi Wine, okukolera mu ggwanga nga si kiwandiise mu mateeka agafuga ebibiina by’ebyobufuzi. Leero ku Lwokubiri, abalamuzi 4 aba kkooti eno okuli; omumyuka wa Ssaabalamuzi Richard Buteera, Kenneth Kakuru, Catherine Bamugemereire ne Irene Mulyagonja, bategeezezza nti kkooti eno terina buyinza kuwulira musango nga guno era bwebatyo ne bagugoba. “Omuwaabi teyeesigama ku nnyingo 50 ng’aleeta omusango gwe era ne mu mpaaba ye tagisiinyaako. Noolwekyo mu ndaba yange omusango guno gwalina kuwaabwa omuntu ng’agoberera ennyingo eyo era gwalina kutwalibwa mu kkooti enkulu si wano.” Omulamuzi Mulyagonja bw’asomye ensala ye. Abalamuzi abalala okuli; Richard Buteera, Kenneth Kakuru ne Catherine Bamugemereire nabo bakkaanyiza ne Mulyagonja wadde ng’omuwaabi tebamulagidde kuliyirira bawawaabirwa. Wabula Omulamuzi Christopher Mandrama ayawukanye ku banne n’agamba nti kyali kikyamu Kyagulanyi okutambuliza emirimu gye mu People Power omwali n’okuvujjirira abantu okuvuganya ate ng’ekibiina kino si kiwandiise mu mateeka. Mu mwaka gwa 2019 munnayuganda Aden Rutaro Ntare, yatwala Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu aka Bobi Wine mu kkooti awamu n’eyali Pulezidenti wa Forum for Democratic Change (FDC),  ng’abavunaana okukulembera ebisinde bino ebitali biwandiise mu mateeka. Rutaro yagamba nti Kyagulanyi y’akulira People Power ng’olumu beeyita ‘People Power-Uganda’ oba ‘People Power’ n’ekigendererwa ky’okuwa abantu akadaala basobole okuvuganya mu bifo ebyenjawulo. Ate ye Dr. Besigye, Rutaro yamuvunaana kutondawo People’s Government’ eyeefaananyiriza gavumenti eri mu buyinza, ekintu ky’agamba nti kikkirizibwa bibiina byabufuzi ebiwandiise mu mateeka.

headline: Amuriat akakasiddwa n’atabukira abapoliisi
text: Kampala Akwatidde ekibiina kya Forum for Democratic Change (FDC) bbendera, Patrick Oboi Amuriat, avumiridde enneeyisa y’abeebyokwerinda n’engeri gye bamukuttemu bw’abadde agenda okwewandiisa ku kisaawe e Kyambogo. Oboi Amuriat nga atuusiddwa e  Kyambogo Amuriat ab’ebyokwerinda okubadde amagye ne poliisi bamukutte ne bamuteeka mu mmotoka yaabwe olwo ne bamutwala ku kisaawe e Kyambogo we babadde beewandiisiza. Ono atuuse talina ngatto mu bigere. “Leero nzize okwewandiisa ng’omusibe, oluvannyuma lw’okuwambibwa nga ngezaako okufuna ebiwandiiko byange okuva ku woofiisi yange e Najjanankumbi, mpambiddwa ab’ebyokwerinda nebanteeka mu mmotoka kika kya Saluuni era bampisizza ddala bubi.” Amuriat bw’agambye Ono ng’addiridde Kyagulanyi mu kwewandiisa, ategeezezza ssentebe w’akakiiko kano, Omulamuzi Byabakama, nga bw’aleeteddwa ng’omuwambe. Oboi ategeezezza bannamawulire nga bwe yawambiddwa poliisi wakati ng’agenda ku kitebe ky’ekibiina e Najjanankumbi okufuna empapula ze wamu n’okwegatta ku bantu b’abadde alina okugenda nabo. Amuriat atuukidde mu bigere, agambye nti abadde afa kimu kumukakasa nga kati ebikolwa bya poliisi nga bino tebigenda kumulemesa kunoonya kalulu. Oboi alaze abantu by’asuubira okutandikirako ng’alondeddwa era nga mu bifo mulimu okutwala mu maaso enkola ya ‘Defiance’ eyatandikibwa Dr. Kizza Besigye. Asuubizza okuyamba bamufunampola okusitula embeera zaabwe basobole okweyagalirira mu ggwanga lyabwe. We tukoledde eggulire lino nga poliisi tennavaayo mu butongole kunnyonnyola nsonga zaakwasizza Amuriat.

headline: Balabudde UPDF ku kweyingiza mu by’obufuzi ebyekubiira
text: Kampala Ebibiina by’obwannakyewa ebiruubirira okunnyikiza demokulaasiya mu Uganda, birabudde abajaasi ba UPDF ne Poliisi, okukomya okweyingiza mu by’obufuzi wamu n’okufulumya ebigambo ebisobola okutabangula emirembe naddala mu kaseera kano ak’okulonda. Senkulu wa FHRI, Dr. Livingstone Ssewanyana Ssenkulu w’ekitongole kya Foundation for Human Rights Initiative (FHRI), Dr. Livingstone Ssewanyana, yategeezezza omukutu gwa URN mu mboozi eyakafubo nti, ebigambo bya bannamagye ebigamba nti, “Tetusobola kuwaayo buyinza eri omuntu atali munnamagye,” tebisaanidde mu kaseera kano ak’okulonda. Kino kiddiridde omuduumizi w’enkambi y’amagye e Kasajjagirwa mu Masaka, Brig. Deus Sande, okusinziira ku mukolo ogwali gutegekeddwa bannakibiina kya NRM okusiima emirimu gy’ amajje nategeeza nti nga amajje tebasobola kuwaayo buyinza eri omuntu atali munnamagye. Mu ngeri y’emu ne Nnampala wa gavumenti, Ruth Nankabirwa, yalabikidde ku katambi ng’agamba abantu b’e Kiboga nga Pulezidenti Museveni bw’atasobola kuwaayo buyinza kulekawo mafuta ge. Bano Dr. Ssewanyana abalabudde nti balina okumanya nti obuyinza bw’abantu ate nga be balonzi era nga singa basalawo ne balonda omuntu omulala yenna, amagye galina kukola kimu kya kugondera biragiro bye. Omukwanaganya w’ekitongole ekirondoola ensonga z’okulonda ‘Citizens Coalition on Electoral Democracy’ -CCEDU, Charity Ahimbisibwe, yannyonnyodde nti Minisita asobola okusonyiyibwa ku bigambo ‘Tetusobola kuwaayo buyinza,’ naye si baduumizi b’amagye abaalayira okuweereza bannayuganda. Ahimbisibwe yagasseeko nti munnamagye oba omupoliisi eyagoera ebigambo ebiweebuula enteekateeka y’okulonda, agezaako kukuma mu bantu muliro era n’asaba bano bavunaanibwe mu bwangu, abalala babalabireko. Omutunuulizi w’ensonga z’ebyokwerinda, Fred Egesa, agamba nti ebigambo bino bigenderere ng’ababyogera bagezaako kumalamu bavuganya gavumenti maanyi. Ono alabudde nti singa abantu banaggwaamu essuubi ly’okukozesa akalulu okukyusa obuyinza, bayinza okwagala okukozesa amakubo amalala.

headline: Kasule Lumumba :  Bobi Wine okuggyayo omusango yakikoze kwonoona kifaananyi kya kkooti
text: Kampala Ssaabawandiisi w’ekibiina kya National Resistance Movement (NRM), Justine Kasule Lumumba, alabudde bannabyabufuzi okukomya okweyagaliza n’ebigendererwa ebikyamu mu kifo ky’okwonoona ekifaananyi kya kkooti z’eggwanga. Ssaabawandiisi wa NRM, Kasule Lumumba  Kino kiddiridde munnakibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP) era Pulezidenti waakyo Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu aka Bobi Wine okulagira bannamateeka be okuggyayo omusango mw’abadde awakanyiza obuwanguzi bwa Museveni ng’agamba nti kkooti yazeefuga. Lumumba yalumirizza Kyagulanyi nti okusooka yali agaanye okugenda mu kkooti kyokka n’amala ne yeekyusa, ekiraga nti yalina ebigendererwa bye. “Ensonga ya Mw. Kyagulanyi okugamba nti Ssaabalamuzi Owiny-Dollo n’Omulamuzi Mike Chibita okuva mu musango olw’okuba baakolaganako ne Museveni ky’abadde kyakwekwasa.” Lumumba bwe yagambye. Okusinziira Ku Lumumba, Pulezidenti Museveni abadde mu by’obufuzi n’obukulembeze okumala emyaka 50 nga kizibu okusanga omuntu atakolaganyeeko naye mu banene abali mu ggwanga. Lumumba yeewuunyizza lwaki Kyagulanyi yakyukidde ekitongole ekiramuzi ate nga mu 2020 omulamuzi Ssekaana yawa ensala ye, Kyagulanyi n’awangula omusango ku kuwandiisibwa kw’ekibiina kye. “Mw. Kyagulanyi ne banne baali basanyufu nga bawangudde omusango naye kati olw’okuba kkooti ensukkulumu yagaanye okubakkiriza okukola ennongoosereza mu mpaaba yaabwe era ne baweebwa amagezi ku kye balina okukola naye kati kkooti azivumirira.” Lumumba bwe yakkaatiriza. Lumumba yasabye Kyagulanyi okutawa bawagizi be ssuubi litaliiwo era bakomye okukkiririza mu bulimba obutambulira ku mutimbagano omuli n’emmeeri ya Amerika eyagobye e Mombasa.

headline: Abantu 500 bokka be bayitiddwa okuziika Ssaabasumba Lwanga
text: Kampala Enteekateeka z’okuziika Ssaabasumba wa Kampala, Dr. Cyprian Kiziito Lwanga nga zigenda mu maaso, Ekereziya Katolika evuddeyo n’etegeeza nti abantu 500 bokka be bagenda okukkirizibwa okuziika era nti bano baamaze dda n’okutegeezebwa ku nteekateeka eno. Ssaabasumba Lwanga agenda kuziikibwa nkya munda mu Ekereziya ya Lubaga wabula abakulu ba Ekereziya bategeezezza nti okusalawo ku muwendo gw’abantu kyakoleddwa okusobola okutangira ensaasaana ya Ssennyiga kolona.  “Tukimanyi nti buli muntu alina eddembe okukungubaga era tewali asaana kulimuggyako mu buli mbeera wabula waliwo abantu abalondeddwa Ekereziya n’aboobuyinza mu Gavumenti. Abo be bagenda okukiikirira ffe abalala  olw’okuba nti tuli mu biseera bya Ssenyiga Kolona.” Rev.Fr. Nicholas Mulumba omwogezi w’Obusumba bwa Kampala bw’ategeezezza. Rev.Fr Mulumba era ayongedde n’atangaaza ku nsonga eno nti tewali kya njawulo kyesigamiziddwako okulonda abantu abagenda okuziika okuggyako okuba nti bakulisitu ate nga beebo abalina akakwate akaamaanyi ku mugenzi. Ono yeegattidwako omwogezi wa poliisi mu Kampala n’emiriraano, Luke Oweyesigire, akkaatirizza nti bagenda kubeera bulindaala nnyo ku nsonga y’okutangira  ekirwadde kya Kolona okusaasaana era n’asaba abakungubazi okukakasa nti bambala obukookolo bwabwe. Ono era alabudde nti wagenda kubaawo okutataaganya eby’entambula naddala ku nguudo ezolekera Ekereziya ye Lubaga. Wano agambye nti abavuzi ba boodabooda tebagenda kukkirizibwa ku nguudo zino okuggyako nga balina ebipapula (stickers) ate nga nabo bagenda kulambikibwa enguudo ze banaakozesa.  Ssaabasumba Lwanga yasangibwa mu kisenge kye ng’afudde ku Lwomukaaga kumakya ng’entabwe yava ku kirwadde kya mutima. Ono yafiiridde ku myaka 68, wabula ng’abadde Ssaabasumba okumala emyaka 15.

headline: Abakulu mu poliisi bagenze ewa Bisoopu Kaggwa okumwetondera
text: Masaka Abanene mu poliisi beesitudde nebagenda ew’Omusumba w’essaza ly’e Masaka eyawummula, John Baptist Kaggwa, bamwetondere ku kikolwa kya basajja baayo okukuba ttiyaggaasi mu Mmisa wamu n’okulagira abaabadde bakung’aanye buli omu okulaba eryamuleese. Afande Kasingye ne Ttiimu ye nga beetongera Omusumba Kaggwa Ku bano kubaddeko akwanaganya poliisi n’ebyobufuzi, Asan Kasingye, akulira eby’okuketta mu poliisi, Ddamulira Christopher SSerunjogi, n’akulira eby’obutendekebwa Godfrey Ggoloba. Abapoliisi bamusanze mu maka ge ku ssaza e Kitovu era ng’ensisinkano eno yeetabiddwamu n’Omusumba wa Masaka aliko mu kiseera kino, Omusumba Serverus Jjumba. Kasingye asoose kwetonda ku ebyo ebyaliwo n’asaba abo bonna abategeka emikolo okusookanga okufuna olukkusa kubanga ekiseera kye tulimu kya Ssennyiga Corona. “Nze nga munnaddini nabasonyiwa dda kuba kiri mu nzikiriza yaffe okusonyiwa.” Omusumba Kaggwa bw’ategezezza nga yaakatandika okwogera. Omusumba Kaggwa agambye nti abapoliisi tebaawa bantu bali Mugulu kwennyonnyolako era ng’embeera y’obunkenke gyebaateekamu abantu yali teyeetaagisa era nga n’ebiragiro bya Ssennyiga Corona byali bikwatiddwa bulungi. Era Omusumba abasabye ab’ebyokwerinda okukolayo ekiwandiiko ekyetondera eggwanga lyonna olwebyo bye bakoze, kisobole okuzza emitima gy’abantu. Kasingye yeebazizza Omusumba Kaggwa olw’okubasonyiwa n’asuubizza nti bagenda kubagawo ekiwandiiko ekyetonda mu butongole eri bannansi era nga kino kkopi bajja kugiweerezaako akulira olukiiko lw’abasumba, Katikkiro wa Buganda wamu n’abeekika ky’Embogo. Ye ate Omusumba w’e Masaka, Bishop Serverus Jjumba, alaze obwennyamivu ku bikolwa bya poliisi era n’abasaba okweddako.

headline: Owek. Mayiga akuutidde abavubuka ku buyiiya n’obumalirivu
text: Kamalabyonna Charles Peter Mayiga akuutidde abavubuka wonna mu ggwanga okubeera abayiiya, abagumiikiriza, era abeesimbu bwebaba baagala okugenda mu maaso basobole okwekalakaanya. Entanda Katikkiro Mayiga agiwadde bw’abadde asisinkanye abavubuka abakulisitaayo okuva mu matendekero ag’enjawulo abeegattira mu kibiina ki National Christian Association. “Obulamu buli emijiji ena, ogusooka nga tuli mabujje, ogw’okubiri ogw’obuvubuka bwemulimu, Ogw’okusajjakula awamu n’obukadde. Naye omujiji ogusinga okubeera omukulu gwe gw’obuvubuka. Byokola ku myaka gino byebisalawo onaaba otya nga osajjakudde. Mulaba abantu abakulu nga babagamba nti yeeyisa nga omwana omuto ekitegeeza nti alina byatakola,” Owek. Mayiga. Abasabye okulemerako mwebyo byebakola basobole okugenda mu maaso mwebyo byebakola kibayambe okulaakulana. Owek. Mayiga abasabye okuwaayo obudde bweba baagala okulaba ku magoba geebyo byebatandiseewo awatali kufaayo ku kiseera era nabasaba babeere beetegefu okuyiga bulijjo okugatta kwebyo byebamanyi. Katikkiro Mayiga bano abagambye nti buli kyebakola tebalina kwerabira buwangwa bwabwe mwebasibuka kuba kijja kubeera kyangu okusobola okukola emirimu emirala.  Bano Ow’omumbuga abeebazizza olw’okunyweza obumu nga beegattira mu kibiina kyabwe era abawadde entanda esobola okubasomesa mu lugendo lwabwe olwobuvubuka. Ye Minisita avunaanyizibwa ku bavubuka, emizannyo n’okwewummuzaamu, Owek. Henry Kiberu Ssekabembe ategeezezza nti ekibiina kino kiri mu nkwatagana naba Buganda Youth Council era nabasaba okukola buli kimu n’obukugu okusobola okuvuganya mu nsi. Akulembeddemu abavubuka bano munnamateeka, Simon Ssenyonga agamba nti ekibiina kino kyatandikibwa mu mwaka gwa 2018 nekigendererwa kyakulaba ng’ abavubuka bwebamaliriza okusoma babaako kyebeekolera wakati nga tebanafuna mirimu.

headline: Eyali Ssaabalabirizi Ntagali awummuziddwa olw’ebyekuusa ku bwenzi
text: Kampala Eyali Ssaabalabirizi w’Ekkanisa ya Uganda, Stanely Ntagali, awummuziddwa ku bigambibwa nti yaganza omukazi omufumbo.  Okusinziira ku mukutu gwa Uganda Radio Network, kino kyalangiriddwa Ssaabalabirizi Kaziimba Mugalu mu bbaluwa eyafulumye nga January 13, 2021. Ebbaluwa eno erumiriza nti Ntagali aliko muka omusajja gw’abadde yaganza era nga’ensonga eno ne Ntagali akkiriza nti aliko ky’agimanyiko. “Obwenzi musango munene ku ddaala lyonna. Eyali Ssaabalabirizi Ntagali yalidde mu mukyala we, obufumbo bwe ne Yesu Kristo olukwe ne bannayuganda ababadde bamutunuulira ng’ekyokulabirako.” Ebbaluwa eri abeepisikoopi bwe yagambye. Kaziimba yagasseeko nti Ekkanisa ya Uganda erina abagoberezi abawera obukadde 13 era nga bano bonna bakemeddwa era ne bonoona naye nga Bbayibuli bw’egamba mu kitabo kya Abaroma 2:23, ekkanisa erina okuteeka abakulembeze baayo ku nninga baleme kuva ku mulamwa. Ono yannyonnyodde nti yamaze dda okutegeeza Ntagali ku nsonga eno era nga yayimiriziddwa okukola obuweereza bw’ekkanisa ku mutendera gwonna wadde okugaba amasakaremento oba okukiikirira ekkanisa. Kaziimba yasabye abakkiriza okusigala nga basabira abafumbo ku njuyi zombi basobole okwenenya era basonyiwagane. “Kano akadde si kakuzunza lugambo. Kadde ka kwetonda, kadde ka kusaba era n’okwekubamu ttooci era twenenye era akadde ak’okutereeza obufumbo bwaffe mu maaso ga Katonda,” Kaziimba bwe yagasseeko. Kaziimba agamba nti Ekkanisa tegenda kuttira muntu yenna ku liiso era nga baakunyweza ekirabo ky’obufumbo era nga bakkiriza nti obufumbo bwa kitiibwa era nga bulina kubaawo wakati w’omwami omu n’omukazi omu. “Tewali muntu ali waggulu w’amateeka ga Katonda. Tuyita abo bonna abamenye etteeka lino, mugende mu maaso ga Katonda mwenenye era musabe ekisonyiwo eri abo be musobezza.” Kaziimba bwe yagambye. Kinajjukirwa nti Ntagali, 65, ye Ssaabalabirizi w’Ekkanisa ya Uganda ey’omunaana era nga yawaayo yafeesi eri Stephen Kaziimba Mugalu nga 01/ 03/2020 oluvannyuma lw’okutuuka ku myaka egiwummula.

headline: Katikkiro Mayiga asabye abasiraamu okunyweza obumu bwebalina ne Buganda
text: Katikkiro wa Buganda Charles Peter Mayiga asabye abasiraamu okunyweza enkolagana n’obumu bwebalina n’Obwakabaka bwa Buganda okusobola okuzza Buganda ku ntikko. Owek. Mayiga bino yabyogeredde ku mukolo Ssaabasajja Kabaka kwasiibulidde abasiraamu ogwayindidde mu bimuli bya Bulange ku Lwokutaano. “Ssaabasajja Kabaka yasiima okusiibulula abasiraamu nga ayagala tunyweze obumu n’okutabagana. Mukusiibulula abasiraamu Ssaabasajja Kabaka abeera atugamba nti baganda bammwe abo yonna gyebali mutuule nabo mu mwezi omutukuvu munyweze obwasseruganda,” Katikkiro Mayiga bwe yagambye.   Owek. Mayiga yasinzidde wano nategeeza nti abaami yonna gyebali balina okubeera abasaale okulwanyisa Siriimu kuba bebatandikiriza amakubo Mukenenya mwayita. Ate ye Supreme Mufti Sheik Muhammad Galabuzi yakubirizza abafumbo okwewala okusaabaana akawuka ka Mukenenya naye bafube okuba abeesigwa eri bannabwe kiyambako okulwanyisa akawuka Kano nga omulamwa gw’omwaka guno bweguvuga nti, ‘Abaami tubeere basaale mukulwanyisa Mukenenya.’   Omukolo guno gwetabiddwako Omumyuka Asooka owa Katikkiro Owek. Hajji Twaha Kawaase Kigongo, amyuka omukubiriza wolukiiko lwa Buganda Owek. Ahmed Lwasa, Owek. Hamis Kakomo, Owek. Hajjat Mariam Mayanja Nkalubo, Loodimmeeya Erias Lukwago, Mmeeya Ali Mulyanyama n’ abakulembeze abalala mu Buganda ne Uganda. Omukolo gw’okusiibulula abasiraamu gubeerawo buli mwaka n’ekigendererwa ky’okunyweza enkolagana wakati w’Obwakabaka n’abaddu ba Allah nga guvujjirirwa kampuni ya Airtel.

headline: Obwakabaka bulonze olukiiko olugenda okwekenneenya amateeka g’omupiira gw’amasaza
text: Obwakabaka bwa Buganda, nga buyita mu minisitule y’abavubuka, ebyemizaanyo n’okwewummuza, bulonze olukiiko lw’abantu 8, okukola ennongoosereza mu mateeka agagenda okuddukanya empaka z’amasaza. Olukiiko olulondeddwa lukulirwa Bainamani Bernard, Omuwandiisi Festus Kirumira ate bammemba kuliko; Frank Kyazze, Haruna Kyobe, Ruth Nalwanga, Mwanje Dan, Richard Kirabira ne Simon Nsubuga “Tubasuubira okutuggyirayo amateeka agasobola okutuyamba okuzimba empaka zino nga mu kino balina okulaba nga ttiimu y’essaza esobola okweyimirizaawo, okufuba okulaba nti wabeerawo obwerufu mu kukung’aanya ensimbi n’okuzisaasaanya n’empuliziganya ku nsonga y’ensimbi. Tulowooza nti amateeka gano gajja kusikiriza bamusigansimbi ne bannamikago abasobola okuteeka ssente mu muzannyo gw’omupiira.” Omuk. Ssejjengo bw’agambye. Ono agamba nti ttiimu zino zibadde zisanga obuzibu bunene okweyimirizaawo wakati ng’abawagizi tebaliiyo mu bisaawe olw’ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona kyokka nga waliyo abavugirizi ne bannamikago abasobola okuzikwasizaako. Okusinziira ku ssentebe w’olukiiko oluddukanya empaka zino, Omuk. Sulaiman Ssejjengo guno gugenda kubeera mulundi gwakubiri nga bategeka empaka zino mu muggalo, era ku luno essira bagenda kuliteeka ku kugema abazannyi era olukiiko olulondeddwa lugenda kulung’amya ku kirina okukolebwa. Agenda okukulira olukiiko luno, Bernard Bainamani ategeezezza nti omulimu ogwabwe omukulu gwakukola nnongoosereza mu mateeka agaliwo naye ate si be balina obuyinza obusembayo ku nsonga eno. “Ogwaffe gwakukung’aanya birowoozo naffe tugattemu ebyaffe tubisindike eri akakiiko akateesiteesi ak’empaka z’amasaza. Batuwadde ebbanga lwa wiiki 2 okuva olwaleero era tutandikiddewo emirimu gyaffe era tetulowooza kusukka bbanga lituweereddwa.” Bainamani bw’ategeezezza. Kinajjukirwa nti empaka z’amasaza ze zimu ku zisinga obuganzi mu ggwanga lino wabula emyaka egiyise zibadde zitawaanyizibwa nnyo ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona ekyateeka eggwanga ku muggalo.

headline: ‘Quarter Final’ z’ekikopo ky’Amasaza ya Ssande eno – Omuk. Ssejjengo
text: Olukiiko oluddukanya emipiira gy’ Amasaza mu Buganda, lutegeezezza nga oluzannya lwa ‘Quarter Finals’ olwali luyimiriziddwa, lugenda luzannyibwa ku Ssande eno. Kino kirangiriddwa Ssentebe w’olukiiko oluddukanya empaka zino, Sulaiman Ssejjengo mu lukung’aana lwa bannamawulire ku Lwokubiri e Bulange Mmengo.  “Twetegereza embeera eno era twebuzizza ku bakugu ab’enjawulo okuva mu bitongole ebikwatibwako netusalawo ‘Quarter’ fayinolo zizanyizibwa ku Ssande nga 2/10/2022 mu masaza Busiro nga Mawokota ekyaza Buddu, Busiro ekyaza Gomba, Ssingo ekyaza Kyaggwe ne Buweekula ejja kuba ekyaza Bulemeezi,” Omuk. Ssejjengo bw’agambye. Omuk. Ssejjengo agamba nti bakukozesa amakubo gonna abakugu gebabalambise okusobola okutangira ensaasaana y’ekirwadde kino. Ono akubiriza ttiimu n’abawagizi okuteekawo ebifo abawagizi webanaanaabira engalo awamu n’okwambala masiki era banywerere ku biragiro ebinabaweebwa okusobola okuziyiza ekirwadde kino. Omuk. Ssejjengo bannabyamizannyo abasabye okubeera obulindaala basobole okukuuma obulamu bwabwe obulungi.

headline: Bannayuganda bakuutiddwa okwetegeka bwebaba baakuwangula mu by’emizannyo
text: Minisita wa Ssaabasajja Kabaka avunanyizibwa ku by’emizannyo, abavubuka n’okwewummuza, Oweek. Henry Sekabembe Kiberu agambye singa Uganda yeteekateeka bulungi, esobola okuwangula engule nnyingi nnyo mu by’emizannyo. Okwogera bino Sekabembe abadde mu Bulange e Mmengo mu kuggalawo omusomo gw’ebyemizannyo ogumanyiddwa nga sports administration and management training, ogumaze ennkau ssatu nga guyinda.  “Uganda nga tweteeseteese bulungi, netukola byetuteekeddwa okukola nga bwetuteekeddwa okubikola, mu butonde bwetulina, mu mmere gyetulya, ne mubaamu obuntu bulamu, ku ddaala lyonna mu nsi yonna tuteekeddwa okusobola okuvuganya n’okuwangula. Omukisa gusanga yeeteeseteese,” Sekabembe bwagambye. Omusomo guno ogwaggulwawo nga Gattonnya 11, gwawagiddwa ekibiina ekikola ku by’emizannyo mu ggwanga ekya Uganda Olympics Committee. Abamu ku beetabye mu musomo  Okusinziira ku Oweek. Hassan Kiyemba, omusomo guno gugendereddwamu okuwa obukugu obw’enjawulo munzirirukanya y’ebyemizannyo  “Tujja kufuba nnyo okulaba nga abantu abaddukanya eby’emizannyo balina obukugu obw’enjawulo tusobola okutunda n’okusikiriza abantu bangi mu masaza gonna okulaba nga bawagira eby’emizannyo,” Kiyemba bwagambye.  Omusomo gwetabiddwamu abatendesi b’omupiira mu masaza, mu bika, mu masomero, obukiiko obukulembera eby’emizannyo mu Bwakabaka nga kwekuli akakiiko akakulembera omupiira gw’amasaza, akakulembera omupiira gw’ebika, omupiira gw’okubaka ogwe’bika, akakiiko akakulembera omupiira gw’amasomero n’ekikopo kya Nnaabagereka n’abamu ku bategesi b’emisinde. Omusomo guno gwagulwawo Oweek. Ssekabembe ng’ali wamu ne pulezidenti wa Uganda Olympics Committee William Blick. Gwetabiddwamu abantu abawera 150.

headline: Golola aweze okuyimusa omutindo gwa Tooro United FC
text: Omutendesi wa kiraabu ya Tooro United omuggya Edward Golola, yeeyamye okukyusa ttiimu eno efuuke eky’okulabirako esobole okuzzaawo ettutumu lyaayo. Bweyabadde ayogerako eri akakiiko ak’ekikugu oluvanyuma lw’okumwanjula  ku Tavern Woods e Kabuusu ku Lwokusatu, Golola yasuubizza okuzzaayo ttiimu eno mu Uganda Premier League. “Twagala okufuula Tooro United FC eky’okulabirako naddala mu kuzuula ebitone ebipya era nga nkakasa nti ttiimu eno ejja kutuwa ekyo kyenyini kyetwagala, nze ndi muwanguzi era nkakasa tujja kuwangula buli mupiira, “ Golola bweyategeezezza. Abalala abagenda okuyambako Golola kuliko; Simon Ddungu amyuka omutendesi, Moses Oloya atendeka bakwasi ba ggoolo, Jamada Magaasi ne Fred Kasendeke owa ttiimu y’abato. Omukolo guno gwetabiddwako omubaka wa Fort Portal mu palamenti Alex Ruhunda, ssenkulu wa ttiimu eno Richard Epieru ne pulezidenti waayo Alice Namatovu.

headline: Basengese ttiimu z’ Amasaza ga Buganda ezinaazannya semi fayinolo
text: Olukiiko oluteekateeka empaka z’amasaza ga Buganda ez’omupiira ogw’ebigere, lukakasizza ensengeka y’emipiira egy’oluzannya lwa semifinal ezigenda okuzannyibwa nga 9 ne 16 omwezi guno ogwa October, 2022. Ku mutendera guno, Buddu egenda kuttunka ne Bulemeezi, Ssingo ettunke ne Busiro. Ensengeka zino zikakasiddwa mu lukiiko olutudde olwaleero ku Bulange e Mengo, lubadde lukubirizibwa ssentebe we mpaka zino Sulaiman Ssejjengo. Ensisinkano eno yeetabiddwamu ttiimu zonna ezatuuse ku luzannya oluddirira olw’akamalirizo. Minisita w’ebyemizannyo n’Abavubuka n’okwewummuzaamu mu bwakabaka Owek Henry Moses Ssekabembe Kiberu, akubiriza ttiimu ezituuse ku mutendera guno okwongera okunyweza empisa ate n’okukulembeza obuntubulamu. Akulira eby’ekikugu mu lukiiko oluddukanya emipiira gy’ Amasaza , Festus Kirumira agambye nti emipiira ku mutendera gw’oluzannya olusooka gigenda kutandika ku ssaawa 10. Emipiira egy’okuddingana gyakutandika ku ssaawa 9 ez’olweggulo
